admin"}},"addEvent(bytes32,uint256[],bytes10[])":{"params":{"_data":"Additionnal data about the Markets","_ipfsAddress":"Ipfs address containing informations about the Event","_markets":"Markets available for the Event"}},"addMarkets(uint256,uint256[],bytes10[])":{"params":{"_data":"Additionnal data about the Markets","_eventId":"Id of the Event","_markets":"Markets available for the close"}},"closeOffer(uint256)":{"params":{"_offerId":"Id of the Offer"}},"constructor":{"params":{"_tokenAddress":"Address of the token used"}},"getMarket(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_eventId":"Id of the Event","_marketIndex":"Index of the Market"}},"openOffer(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"Amount the bookmaker is putting on the Offer","_eventId":"Id of the Event","_marketIndex":"Index of the Market","_outcome":"Outcome of the market the bookmaker is opening the Offer on","_price":"Price the bookmaker is selling the Offer for","_timestampExpiration":"timestamp the Offer expires on"}},"removeAdmin(address)":{"params":{"_addr":"The address to unset from admins"}},"setEventResult(uint256,uint256[],uint256[])":{"params":{"_eventId":"Id of the Event","_markets":"Markets to set results to","_outcomes":"Outcomes of the Markets"}}},"title":"SocialBet contract"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addAdmin(address)":{"notice":"Set address as an admin"},"addEvent(bytes32,uint256[],bytes10[])":{"notice":"Add new event to smart contract. offer"},"buyOfferBulk(uint256[],uint256)":{"notice":"Buy multiple offers"},"cancelEvent(uint256)":{"notice":"Cancel an event"},"claimBetEarnings(uint256)":{"notice":"Close a bet and send earnings to winner"},"closeOffer(uint256)":{"notice":"Close an offer"},"constructor":"Constructor, take _tokenAddress","getMarket(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Returns a market"},"openOffer(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Open a new offer"},"removeAdmin(address)":{"notice":"Remove address from admins"},"setEventResult(uint256,uint256[],uint256[])":{"notice":"Set results to an event markets"}},"notice":"This contract is used for SocialBet decentralized sports betting devdoc.details: This contract interact with WETH ERC-20 token contract

params._addr: The address to set as an admin

params._ipfsAddress: Ipfs address containing informations about the Event

params._amount: Amount you're buying the Offer with
Amount you're buying the Offers with

params._betId: Id of the Bet to close

params._amount: Amount the bookmaker is putting on the Offer
params._outcome: Outcome of the market the bookmaker is opening the Offer on
params._price: Price the bookmaker is selling the Offer for

params._addr: The address to unset from admins

devdoc.title: SocialBet contract

addEvent(bytes32,uint256[],bytes10[]).notice: Add new event to smart contract. The details of the event are found in the ipfs address

addMarkets(uint256,uint256[],bytes10[]).notice: Add new markets to existing event

claimBetEarnings(uint256).notice: Close a bet and send earnings to winner

setEventResult(uint256,uint256[],uint256.notice: Set results to an event markets

userdoc.notice: This contract is used for SocialBet decentralized sports betting platform
